--- title: "\U0001F409 Intro to Orange" author: "Arvind Venkatadri" date: 12/26/2022 linkTitle: Intro to Orange summary: Using A Visual drag and drop tool called Orange view: 2 weight: 1 --- ## Introduction to Orange **Orange** is a visual drag-and-drop tool for - Data visualization - Machine Learning - Data mining and much more. Here is what it looks like: ![](https://orangedatamining.com/screenshots/images/tree-explorative.thumb.png) All operations are done using a visual menu-driven interface. The visuals can be exported to PNG/SVG/PDF and the entire workflow can be exported into a Report Form and edited for presentation and sharing. ## Installing Orange You can download and install Orange from here: https://orangedatamining.com/download/ ## Basic Usage of Orange `{{% youtube "HXjnDIgGDuI" %}}`{=html}
## Orange Workflows `{{% youtube "lb-x36xqJ-E" %}}`{=html}
## Widgets and Channels `{{% youtube "2xS6QjnG714" %}}`{=html}
## Loading data into Orange `{{% youtube "MHcGdQeYCMg" %}}`{=html}
We are good to get started with Orange!! ## Simple Visuals using Orange Let us create some simple visualizations using Orange. - Use the File Widget to import the `iris` dataset into your session - Use the Data Table Widget to look at the data, and note its variable names - Use the Visualization Widgets ( Scatter Plot, Bar Plot, and Distributions) to look at the properties of the variables, and examine relationships between them. ## Reference 1. Introduction to *Data Mining-Working notes for the hands-on course with Orange Data Mining*. [(Download file)](Interactive Visual Data Mining in Orange - kolkata.pdf)
